Articles.Content: Year 405: underpants are invented. The peasants rejoice!
Year 406: the kraken is first sighted as a baby squid in the ocean that can fly up and eat birds
Year 415: A kerbal discovers spontaneous combustion within the range of the gunpowder rocket. Various kerbals get frightened by the act of that specific kerbal's bravery.

Year 404: History not found.

Easter egg?

year 416

The first suborbital flight is done when a stuntman, Jebidiah Kerman is strapped onto a SRB with ropes and flew. He lived somehow.

Easter egg?

Uh, how is that an easter egg? It was a joke. You know, 404 page not found.

Year 417 Bill kerman enters his career by surveying kerbins biome on a "gunpowder car"
420: the first plane is invented as the winged craft goes flying off the cliff face and into the water
420.0001: The first casualty from an accident involving a winged craft occurs
421: Jebediah Kerman is the first person to test pilot a plane on a rocket. When thought of the idea: "Why not?"
422: jebidiah is the first kerman to die in a rocket crash.
423: Jebediah all of a sudden comes back from the dead and forms the religion of Jebtianity. 2 crossed SRBs becomes its symbol.
Year 424: Jeb attaches "More nozzles" that he calls "boosters" It goes fast, but explodes even faster. The phrase MOAR BOOSTERS begins to develop.
Year 425: A kerbal finds a crashed ship in the desert. New materials are discovered and incorporated into their suit's helmets.

Year 426: Jebediah Kerman, in an effort to see how moar boosters would have an effect on speed, accidentally warps time and ends up 2000 years into the future.not is now 2427.

Seriously, 300 years after being hunter-gatherers and kerbals already have SRBs.

Year 426: Jebediah Kerman, in an effort to see how moar boosters would have an effect on speed, accidentally warps time and ends up 2000 years into the future.not is now 2427.

Seriously, 300 years after being hunter-gatherers and kerbals already have SRBs.

Yup. kerbals are the best inventors around.

year 427:

Kerbals find that oil burns longer than fireworks. liquid fuel (first gen) is born
Sorry for double posting: but i have just got an idea. Kerbals now use SRBs to banish exiled criminals in428
Year 430 Kerbals find that if you refine oil you get other types of fuel.

Year 430.5: While refining oil, one of the Kerbals left the oil refining too long; it, for some reason, turned into an invisible gas. A careless Kerbal daemon started this when he lit a match while the gas was in the air.

Year 431: It is found that the invisible gas turns into liquid when it becomes incredibly cold. The liquid is, in fact, highly flammable, much to the detriment of the 10 kerbals standing closest to it.
Year 432: The first community space programs are formed and the liquid engine is discovered when a kerbal poured oil in to a smoking pipe.
433: The fuel tank is invented said smoking pipe was placed under a leaky oil barrel.
440: After some kind of Kerbal "middle ages" science comes again.Kerbals have been thinking of hmm... surviving? (Jeb was confused hearing this.). They invent a parachute.
445: A weird rock is found (blutonium) that makes kerbals very sick, a ritual mixing of this substance with rocket fuel and drinking it is created to appease the gods, it is known as 'Jeb's coffee'
445,0000001 First death from drinking a posion.
